<p>ç»è¿‡ç®€å•çš„è°ƒç ”é€‰æ‹©äº† <strong>QRCode.js</strong></p>

<p>QRCode.js æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨äºç”ŸæˆäºŒç»´ç çš„ JavaScript åº“ã€‚ä¸»è¦æ˜¯é€šè¿‡è·å– DOM çš„æ ‡ç­¾,å†é€šè¿‡ HTML5 Canvas ç»˜åˆ¶è€Œæˆ,ä¸ä¾èµ–ä»»ä½•åº“ã€‚ä»–æ”¯æŒ nodejs ç«¯ï¼Œæµè§ˆå™¨ç«¯ï¼Œä»¥åŠå°ç¨‹åºç«¯ã€‚</p>

<p>æ ¹æ®æ“ä½œç¯å¢ƒï¼Œæœ‰å››ä¸ªçº§åˆ«å¯ä¾›é€‰æ‹©ã€‚</p>

























<table><thead><tr><th>Level</th><th align="center">Error resistance</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><strong>L</strong> (Low)</td><td align="center"><strong>~7%</strong></td></tr><tr><td><strong>M</strong> (Medium)</td><td align="center"><strong>~15%</strong></td></tr><tr><td><strong>Q</strong> (Quartile)</td><td align="center"><strong>~25%</strong></td></tr><tr><td><strong>H</strong> (High)</td><td align="center"><strong>~30%</strong></td></tr></tbody></table>
<p>çº§åˆ«è¶Šé«˜ï¼Œæä¾›çš„æŠ—é”™è¯¯æ€§è¶Šå¥½ï¼Œä½†ä¼šé™ä½ç¬¦å·çš„å®¹é‡</p>








































<table><thead><tr><th>Mode</th><th>L</th><th>M</th><th>Q</th><th>H</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>Numeric</td><td>7089</td><td>5596</td><td>3993</td><td>3057</td></tr><tr><td>Alphanumeric</td><td>4296</td><td>3391</td><td>2420</td><td>1852</td></tr><tr><td>Byte</td><td>2953</td><td>2331</td><td>1663</td><td>1273</td></tr><tr><td>Kanji</td><td>1817</td><td>1435</td><td>1024</td><td>784</td></tr></tbody></table>
<ul>
<li><strong>color</strong>ï¼šæŒ‡å®šQRç å›¾åƒçš„é¢œè‰²</li>

<p>darkï¼šäºŒç»´ç ä¸»ä½“é¢œè‰²ï¼Œlightï¼šäºŒç»´ç èƒŒæ™¯é¢œè‰²</p>
<ul>

<h3 data-id="heading-4">nodejs-server ç«¯å¸¸è§ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•</h3>
<p><strong>è½¬æˆç»ˆç«¯å¯è¾“å‡ºçš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²</strong></p>
<p><code>toString(text, [options], [cb(error, string)])</code>
è¿”å›QRç çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è¡¨ç¤ºå½¢å¼ã€‚
å¦‚æœé€‰æ‹©çš„è¾“å‡ºæ ¼å¼æ˜¯svgï¼Œå®ƒå°†è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªåŒ…å«xmlä»£ç çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€‚</p>

]

    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.error(err)

è¿”å›åŒ…å«QRç å›¾åƒè¡¨ç¤ºå½¢å¼çš„æ•°æ®URIã€‚

<p>å°†QR Codeä¿å­˜åˆ°å›¾åƒæ–‡ä»¶ã€‚
å¦‚æœæœªæŒ‡å®šoptions.typeï¼Œåˆ™å°†ä»æ–‡ä»¶æ‰©å±•åä¸­çŒœæµ‹æ ¼å¼ã€‚</p>

        <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">"success"</span>)
    &#125;).catch(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">err</span> =></span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.error(err)
    &#125;)

<span class="copy-code-btn">å¤åˆ¶ä»£ç </span></code></pre>
<p>QRcode åŒæ—¶æ”¯æŒ ES5 / ES6 / ES7 çš„è¯­æ³•</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> QRCode <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'qrcode'</span>

<span class="hljs-comment">// With Callback</span>
QRCode.toString(<span class="hljs-string">'http://www.google.com'</span>, <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">err, string</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (err) <span class="hljs-keyword">throw</span> err
  <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(string)
&#125;)
<span class="hljs-comment">// With promises</span>

  .then(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">url</span> =></span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(url)
  &#125;)
  .catch(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">err</span> =></span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.error(err)
  &#125;)

<span class="hljs-comment">// With async/await</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> generateQR = <span class="hljs-keyword">async</span> text => &#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">try</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> QRCode.toDataURL(text))
  &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">catch</span> (err) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.error(err)
  &#125;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">å¤åˆ¶ä»£ç </span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-5">åœ¨å¾®ä¿¡å°ç¨‹åºä¸­ä½¿ç”¨</h3>
